title: RosettaOptions
description: The options that will be sent directly to /construction/metadata by the caller.

status.description: This value indicates the state of the operations

gas_limit.description: Maximum price a user is willing to pay.

gas_price.description: Cost necessary to perform a transaction on the network

suggested_fee_multiplier.description: A suggested fee multiplier to indicate that the suggested fee should be scaled. This may be used to set higher fees for urgent transactions or to pay lower fees when there is less urgency.

max_fee.description: Maximum fee user is willing to pay

size.description: Transaction approximative size (used to calculate total fee).
